texto: Increased task clarity (discover projects, join, apply) by shipping a card-based IA and consistent component states, validated through 6 iteration rounds with core admins.
Reduced visual inconsistency by introducing a tokenized design system and component library, streamlining future page builds.
Strengthened brand trust by unifying identity across site and socials, supporting organic impressions and higher event conversion.
Reduced handoff time by delivering a compact UI kit + UX copy up front, enabling engineers to implement net-new screens in minutes, not hours.
Increased task clarity (join via course ID, post question, review insights) by tightening labels and microcopy across core flows.
Strengthened judge comprehension with a clean visual hierarchy that mapped directly to the pitch storyline.
Reduced asset turnaround from hours to minutes by templating posters/social cards in Figma, accelerating campaign launches.
Improved recognition and trust with a cohesive identity (site, signage, social), aiding partner onboarding and school approvals.
Increased result comprehension by redesigning the readout to top-1 + alternates with confidence and disclaimer, shortening scan time in demos.
Reduced cognitive load with consistent color chips and typography scale across the 7 classes, improving recognition in user walk-throughs.
Accelerated sign-off from clinical advisors by converting interview insights into concrete component updates within 48-hour cycles.
Reduced cognitive load by introducing a meal roulette and compact plan cards, shortening decision time in tests.
Accelerated build by handing off a tokenized component library, enabling rapid Flutter implementation.
Increased perceived attainability via supportive copy and light gamification (challenges/rewards), aligning with interview insights.
Reduced cognitive load by collapsing creation into four discrete decisions, increasing first-try completion in demo sessions.
Improved control without complexity via the bubble weighting UI, letting users up-weight ideas with a tap instead of sliders or forms.
Accelerated build by designing directly for HTML/CSS (no design-system overhead), enabling a same-night ship.
